#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,i,pi,pa;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		pi = 0;
		pa = 0;
		cin>>n;
		int pie[n];
		int pan[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>pie[i];
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>pan[i];
		}
		sort(pie,pie + n,greater<int>());
		sort(pan,pan + n,greater<int>());
		while(pi!=n && pa!=n)
		{
			if(pie[pi] > pan[pa])
			{
				pi++;
			}
			else if(pie[pi] <= pan[pa])
			{
				pi++;
				pa++;
			}
		}
		cout<<n - abs(pa-pi)<<endl;

	}
	return 0;
}
